summary: Follower by the name of Matthias, a heavy armor warrior type who is skilled with two-handers and 1-handed swords and shields.  My first follower mod so please leave feed back if needed! He is found in the bannered mare in White Run.
descriptionHtml:
Follower by the name of Matthias, a heavy armor warrior type who is skilled with two-handers and 1-handed swords and shields.  My first follower mod so please leave feed back if needed! He is found in the bannered mare in White Run.  He is also a marriage partner, along with being essential so he won\'t die! Just give him a moment to get back up.

I don\'t believe he needs anything specific other than Apachii Hair for males, but I can always recommend plenty of mods to go with him.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/? - Apachii Hair 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35092/? Retexture for Apachii Hair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/? Eyes of beauty!

I can always recommend Better Males as well, the mod doesn\'t seem to be here on the Nexus anymore.  If I can think of anything else...I\'ll add it later.
author: Jedda678
